name: The Royal Holiday
storyline: You've gotten married and saved Cordonia, but before you embark on your honeymoon, Olivia's invited you to spend the holidays in Lythikos! There'll be plenty of snow, mistletoe, and uniquely local traditions in The Royal Holiday as you and your friends help Cordonia's fiercest duchy rediscover the true meaning of Christmas.
summary: The Royal Holiday is a holiday special book of The Royal Romance series. It is a sequel to The Royal Romance series, and a prequel to The Royal Heir series, respectively.
